code: @Test public void testRollbackCustomMessageNotUseException() throws Exception {     getMockEndpoint("mock:start").expectedMessageCount(1).     getMockEndpoint("mock:result").expectedMessageCount(0).     String out = template.requestBody("direct:start", "Hello World", String.class).     assertEquals("We cannot do this", out).     assertMockEndpointsSatisfied(). }
@Override public void configure() throws Exception {     from("direct:start").to("mock:start").transform(constant("We cannot do this")).markRollbackOnly().to("mock:result"). }

@Override protected RouteBuilder createRouteBuilder() throws Exception {     return new RouteBuilder() {          @Override         public void configure() throws Exception {             from("direct:start").to("mock:start").transform(constant("We cannot do this")).markRollbackOnly().to("mock:result").         }     }. }
